channel.title: Godsword
channel.description:
ok, i want the real godsword specs(like close as possible which i have the models already but not a clue on how to add to the server) so il post whats in my client but i dont know what to add to the server to make them use the animation and etc
[code]case 648: // GFX ID Saradomin Godsword Special originalDataID = 282; //This is the original ID gfx.anInt405 = 8203; //This is the new Id break; case 651: // This is the GFX ID for AGS change if you want originalDataID = 282; //This is the original ID gfx.anInt405 = 2849; //This is the new Id break; case 656: // This is the GFX ID for SS change if you want originalDataID = 282; //This is the original ID gfx.anInt405 = 10500; //This is the new Id break; case 590: // This is the GFX ID for BGS change if you want originalDataID = 282; //This is the original ID gfx.anInt405 = 8211; //This is the new Id break; case 592: // This is the GFX ID to ZGS change if you want originalDataID = 282; //This is the original ID gfx.anInt405 = 8223; //This is the new Id break; case 653: // GFX ID Zamorak Godsword Special originalDataID = 282; //This is the original ID gfx.anInt405 = 8223; //This is the new Id break; case 654: // GFX ID Bandos Godsword Special originalDataID = 282; //This is the original ID gfx.anInt405 = 8211; //This is the new Id break; case 643: // GFX ID Dark bow Special originalDataID = 7; gfx.anInt405 = 2391; // This is the Model ID! (Original was 26391) break; case 642: /* Item ID -Yarnova */ originalDataID = 6; gfx.anInt405 = 3102; /* Model ID -Yarnova */ break;[/code]
